::Spears::

She looked at Striker with a heavy spark. She looked back down and  
kept walking.  She ignored her burned quills and back.  She only 
thought about how thwar had destroyed so much of the beautiflu land 
around them.  And then, even that little spot of rich, lush, 
florishing beauty that took the matrix knew how long to grow and 
blossom, was destroyed in a matter of moment.  She lowered her head 
and took Striker's arm.  She held his arm tightly in hers and tried 
not to cry at the thought of yet another palce of beauty was now gne 
forever.
